original_text: But you must always obey him completely. So be careful to obey all the commands that I am giving to you today.
korean_text: 네가 만일 네 하나님 여호와의 말씀만 듣고 내가 오늘 네게 내리는 그 명령을 다 지켜 행하면

sentences.original_text: But you must always obey him completely
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 너는 항상 그를 완전히 순종해야 한다

sentences.original_text: that I am giving to you today
